scripts.build:sidecar-windows: pyinstaller -c -F --clean --name main-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --distpath src-tauri/binaries/api --paths src-python --collect-all app --add-data "src-python/resources/*;resources/" src-python/app/main.py
scripts.build:sidecar-macos: pyinstaller -c -F --clean --name main-aarch64-apple-darwin --distpath src-tauri/binaries/api --paths src-python --collect-all app --add-data "src-python/resources/*;resources/" src-python/app/main.py
scripts.build:sidecar-linux: pyinstaller -c -F --clean --name main-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --distpath src-tauri/binaries/api --paths src-python --collect-all app --add-data "src-python/resources/*;resources/" src-python/app/main.py
